title: WP_REST_API_User
description: A user object in a REST API context.

username.description: Login name for the user. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

first_name.description: First name for the user. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

last_name.description: Last name for the user. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

email.description: The email address for the user. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

locale.description: Locale for the user. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

nickname.description: The nickname for the user. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the user.

registered_date.description: Registration date for the user in UTC. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

roles.description: Roles assigned to the user. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

capabilities.description: All capabilities assigned to the user. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

extra_capabilities.description: Any extra capabilities assigned to the user. Only present when using the 'edit' context.

24.description: Avatar URL with image size of 24 pixels.

48.description: Avatar URL with image size of 48 pixels.

96.description: Avatar URL with image size of 96 pixels.

additionalProperties.description: Avatar URL with image of another size.
